definition: to explore/to go on an expedition/adventure
to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward

sentences.english: Beattie's solution to the Franklin mystery took four expeditions and Simonson is not expecting miracles.
sentences.chinese: 比泰決心解開富蘭克林探險隊作過四次探險運動之迷。

sentences.english: Beattie's solution to the Franklin mystery took four expeditions and Simonson is not expecting miracles.
sentences.chinese: 比泰決心解開富蘭克林探險隊作過四次探險運動之迷。

sentences.english: Mackinac Island is an easy place for families to explore.
sentences.chinese: 麥基諾島也很適合一家人探險。

sentences.english: Sigourney Weaver plays a botanist overseeing the exploration.
sentences.chinese: 維弗扮演一位植物學家，監督這次探險。

sentences.english: A diver explores wire coral in Japan's Suruga Bay.
sentences.chinese: 一位潛水者探險鐵絲珊瑚在日本的Suruga灣。

sentences.english: In 2009, a team of British cavers investigated a recently uncovered cave in a remote Vietnamese jungle.
sentences.chinese: 年，一羣英國洞窟專家到越南中部森林深處探險。

sentences.english: The party, however, carried out a thorough reconnaissance of K2 from south to north-east.
sentences.chinese: 然而探險隊從南到東北對喬戈裏峯完成了徹底的勘探。

sentences.english: I thought of the early polar explorers as I braced myself for the walk.
sentences.chinese: 當我縮起身子走路時想起了早期的極地探險者。

sentences.english: Tom: There is a lake lying in the east of the city. It’s said that there are many places to explore.
sentences.chinese: 在城東有個湖泊，據說那邊有很多地方可以探險。

sentences.english: Inevitably her exploits were exaggerated and she became known as an adventuress .
sentences.chinese: 難免會誇大她的勇敢行爲，她成了有名的探險者。

sentences.english: Romanenko is also one of few explorers to have visited Wrangel Island.
sentences.chinese: 羅曼年科也是到過弗蘭格爾島的少數探險家之一。

sentences.english: The old man guided the explorers through the forest.
sentences.chinese: 老人領着探險隊員們穿過森林。

sentences.english: The image was taken by the Expedition 28 crew.
sentences.chinese: 拍下這幅圖片的是探險隊28號成員。

sentences.english: Exploring the Naica caves requires more than just industrial strength water pumps.
sentences.chinese: 進入奈卡洞穴探險需要除工業用水泵外更多的防護。

sentences.english: The team will return to India to continue studying Koro in November.
sentences.chinese: 這支探險隊會在十一月份回到印度繼續研究珂珞語。

sentences.english: You will be provided with a caving helmet, head lamp and ropes as required.
sentences.chinese: 您將獲得探險所需的頭盔，頭燈和繩索。

definition: to amuse oneself/to have fun/to go sightseeing/to take a stroll
to look for/to seek/to find fault
to be amazed/to be surprised/to wonder
